title: Police Use Stingray Tool To Intercept Cell Phone Signals
teaser: For All Tech Considered, NPR's Audie Cornish talks with Manoush Zomorodi, host of WNYC's "Note to Self" podcast, about an often unmentioned feature of your cell phone that may be helping law enforcement catch criminals.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
